Daggubati Victory Venkatesh:

Born December 13, 1960 (1960-12-13) (age 47)

Karamchedu, India

Other name Venky

Occupation Actor

Spouse Neeraja

Venkatesh charges close to 3 crores per movie and is considered one of the most wealthy film stars in India. According to reuters, his family’s estimated wealth is over 987 crores.

Venkatesh debuted through Kaliyuga Pandavulu in 1986. Just two years old as an actor, Venkatesh acted in Swarnakamalam directed by Kasinadhuni Viswanath. Varasudochadu, released in the same year, was another trophy. After a few flops, he got a break in the form of Bobbili Raja. Added to that the name and performance of Venkatesh was delightful Divya Bharati, good comedy and melodious music. Bobbili Raja was a musical hit and also entertained audience from all sections because of its ingredients. In Shathruvu, Venkatesh played angry young lawyer who takes law into his hands after failing to fight the corruption through the court. Venkatesh has also worked with famed Bollywood director Ram Gopal Varma in the film Kshana Kshanam, which was a huge success at the box office. Chanti, a remake of Tamil movie Chinna Thambi, happened in 1991. Chanti was definitely a challenging project for Venkatesh. Chanti was a box office hit and Venkatesh’s career benefitted hugely by it. Anari was the remake of Chanti in Bollywood’s Hindi cinema. Venkatesh started becoming a family hero and turned out a huge fan following among women. Venkatesh has acted in a lot of blockbusters. His recent films, Adavari Matalaku Ardhalu Verule and Tulasi are big hits. He is very aggressive in the work. Also he is known to be very down to earth and spiritual person. And also he is one of the best comedy heroes of the telugu film industry at the same time he acted in many serious roles and action movies like Gharshana, Lakshmi etc. He also has many lady fans because of his many romantic and family entertainer films.

Venkatesh has three daughters with his wife Neeraja: Ashritha, Hayavahini and Bhavana. He also has one son named Arjun Ramnath. They live in Jubilee Hills, the most expensive area in Hyderabad . Through his brother, Venkatesh also has aristocratic connections – Dr. Suresh Babu married into the Chitturi zamindars of Kulla.

Education

M.B.A. from Montery university, USA

Fast Facts

� Son of D.Ramanaidu (Suresh Productions)

� First film Kaliyuga Pandadulu released in 1986

� First Nandi Award for Kaliyuga Pandavulu in 86.

� His brother Sureshbabu is also a producer.

Family

Venkatesh has three daughters with his wife Neeraja: Ashritha, Hayavahini and Bhavana. He also has one son named Arjun Ramnath. They live in Jubilee Hills, the most expensive area in Hyderabad . Through his brother, Venkatesh also has aristocratic connections – Dr. Suresh Babu married into the Chitturi zamindars of Kulla.

Full Name: Daggubati Venkatesh

Date of Birth: 13-12-1960

Place of Birth: Karamchedu

Father: D.Ramanaidu

Mother: Rajeshwari

Brother: D.Suresh Babu

Sister: lakshmi

Education: Primary to 12th Standard (Don Bosco Public School Chennai), B.com (Loyola College, Chennai), M.B.A (Monterey University, USA)

Marriage: 13-12-1985

First Film Shooting: 1-1-1986, Vijaya gardens Chennai.

First Studio: Annapurna Studio

First Telugu movie: Kaliyuga Pandavalu

First Hindi Movie: Anari

First Jubilee Movie: Bobilli Raja

First Double role Movie: Aggi Ramudu

First abroad shooting: Thrimurtulu

First 100 days Function: Kaliyuga Pandavallu at Siddhartha College Vijayawada.

First Director: K.Ragavendra rao

First Heroine: Kushboo

First Music Director: Chakravathy

Venkatesh debuted through Kaliyuga Pandavulu in the year 1986. The movie was not only a hit but also got him his first Nandi award, which is a rare accomplishment for an actor who has just completed his debut film. At an early phase of his career, Venkatesh got to work with Kasinadhuni Viswanath, who is considered a great classical director. Just two years old as an actor, Venkatesh acted in Swarnakamalam directed by Kasinadhuni Viswanath. The movie got him his second Nandi. Varasudochadu, released in the same year, was another trophy. After a few flops, he got a break in the form of Bobbili Raja. Added to the name and performance of Venkatesh was delightful Divya Bharati, good comedy and melodious music. Bobbili Raja was a musical hit and also entertained audience from all sections because of it’s ingredients. In Shathruvu, Venkatesh played angry young lawyer who takes law into his hands after failing to fight the corruption through the court.

January 5, 2009 victorieschat
